description: Yes, this is really vegan! Vegan Mozzarella Grilled Cheese sandwich where have you been all my life? The cheese only takes 15 minutes to make and is so melty and stretchy. Yum!
name: Vegan Mozzarella Grilled Cheese
recipeIngredient: 1 recipe Melty Stretchy Gooey Vegan Mozzarella

recipeInstructions.text: Butter one side of each of the slices of bread. Take three of the slices and divide the Melty Stretchy Gooey Vegan Mozzarella evenly among them. Top the bread with the remaining three slices of bread, butter sides out.
Heat a pan over medium heat, and grill the sandwiches until they are golden brown on the bottom. Flip each sandwich and brown on the other side. Make sure the sandwiches are heated through.
